about-me/contact-information.title: Contact information
about-me/contact-information.description: I’d love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, collaboration ideas, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out:

docs-example/faqs.title: FAQs
docs-example/faqs.description: These FAQs sample showcase common questions from Sensedia Integrations, organized by topic for easy navigation. They provide clear, practical guidance on authorization, connectors, and executions, helping users quickly understand key platform features and resolve common issues.

docs-example/feature-spec.title: Feature spec
docs-example/feature-spec.description: Sensedia Integrations uses Apache Camel components and EIPs to build integration flows.

docs-example/glossary.title: Glossary
docs-example/glossary.description: This glossary sample presents key terms and concepts from Sensedia Integrations, organized for easy reference. It helps users quickly understand the platform’s language and functionality, demonstrating how clear, structured documentation supports effective learning and usage.

docs-example/release-notes.title: Release notes
docs-example/release-notes.description: These release notes sample highlight Sensedia Integrations’ new features, improvements, and fixes, clearly communicated for users. They demonstrate how structured, user-focused documentation keeps users informed, and supports effective use of the product.

docs-example/scripts.title: Script
docs-example/scripts.description: The excerpt below comes from a training session that walks users through the creation of an integration flow, guiding them step by step from start to finish. It includes detailed configurations for each step, along with the corresponding logs and traces.

docs-example/tutorials.title: Tutorial
docs-example/tutorials.description: This tutorial explains how to integrate Sensedia’s API Platform and Events Hub to help Open Finance customers in Brazil comply with Central Bank requirements.

docs-example/ux-writing.title: UX writing
docs-example/ux-writing.description: This page showcases examples of microcopy I created for the product’s interface.
